channel.title: Server ip and client ip, help me?
channel.description: I'm starting up a RSPS and i was wondering how to make the server run on a certain ip or do i just run the server? And the client where do i put the ip it connects too? I looked for the gui.java and there isn't one. Thanks for the help and could some one post a link to a tut to make a webclient? Thanks again.

item.title: Server ip and client ip, help me?
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

just in the client, dont change anything else, look up 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 and change where it says “server = 217.0.0.1” or “server = 0.0.0.0” to your ip

Read full topic
item.source: Server ip and client ip, help me?
